title: In signal honour: 1865-1965, 100 years of telecommunications
brief_description: Produced to celebrate the centenary (1865-1965) of the International Telecommunications Union, this film traces the development of telecommunications during the last hundred years, showing the emergence and impact of telephone, radio, television and apace communications. Highlights include international television transmissions.
